abstract: Get or set the synthesizer’s current number-processing mode.
overview:
## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object that specifies whether the synthesizer is currently in normal or literal number-processing mode. The supported values are listed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode].

When the number-processing mode is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode/normal], the synthesizer assembles digits into numbers (so that “12” is spoken as “twelve”). When the mode is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode/literal], each digit is spoken literally (so that “12” is spoken as “one, two”).

This property is used with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/setObject(_:forProperty:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)].

# numberMode

**Type Property**

Get or set the synthesizer’s current number-processing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
static let numberMode: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object that specifies whether the synthesizer is currently in normal or literal number-processing mode. The supported values are listed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode].

When the number-processing mode is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode/normal], the synthesizer assembles digits into numbers (so that “12” is spoken as “twelve”). When the mode is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/Mode/literal], each digit is spoken literally (so that “12” is spoken as “one, two”).

This property is used with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/setObject(_:forProperty:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)].

## Speech Property Keys

- **status**: Get speech-status information for the synthesizer.
- **errors**: Get speech-error information for the synthesizer.
- **inputMode**: Get or set the synthesizer’s current text-processing mode.
- **characterMode**: Get or set the synthesizer’s current text-processing mode.
- **rate**: Get or set a synthesizer’s speech rate.
- **pitchBase**: Get or set a synthesizer’s baseline speech pitch.
- **pitchMod**: Get or set a synthesizer’s pitch modulation.
- **volume**: Get or set the speech volume for a synthesizer.
- **synthesizerInfo**: Get information about the speech synthesizer being used on the specified synthesizer.
- **recentSync**: Get the message code for the most recently encountered synchronization command.
- **phonemeSymbols**: Get a list of phoneme symbols and example words defined for the synthesizer.
- **currentVoice**: Set the current voice on the synthesizer to the specified voice.
- **commandDelimiter**: Set the embedded speech command delimiter characters to be used for the synthesizer.
- **reset**: Set a synthesizer back to its default state.
- **outputToFileURL**: Set the speech output destination to a file or to the computer’s speakers.
